participant_1.name: Lucas
participant_1.personality: Passionate and empathetic, Lucas cares deeply about animals and their well-being. He's a dedicated actor who loves his craft and enjoys making connections with others.
participant_1.background: Now I am a fixture on a weekly telenovela. I made my first movie when I was 18. I am an actor. I starred in television commercials when I was young. I have been acting since I was ten years old.

participant_2.name: Emma
participant_2.personality: Creative and lively, Emma has a zest for life and enjoys expressing herself through dance. She has a quirky side, evident in her dislike for country music and her playful honesty about her spelling skills.
participant_2.background: I m an amazing dancer. I have blonde hair that reaches my knees. I volunteer at animal shelters. Country music makes me cringe. I m a terrible speller.

content.text: Hello, I'm a dancer and volunteer at animal shelters.
That's great! I love animals too.
Me too! I volunteer at my local animal shelter every weekend.
That's awesome! I wish I had the time to volunteer.
You should! There are so many animals that need our help.
I know, and I feel terrible for them.
Me too. But we can make a difference.
We should go volunteer together sometime.
That would be so much fun!
